text: "We'll Be Back" is a song by American thrash metal band Megadeth. It is the main single for the band's sixteenth album, The Sick, the Dying... and the Dead!. It was released on June 23, 2022. It was the first song from the album to be played at a concert. == Music video == A music video was made for the song. It is a part of a series of three music videos for The Sick, the Dying... and the Dead! that tell a story about Vic Rattlehead. The video shows many military gun battles. The music video was made by Dave Mustaine, the band's singer. The music video is the first one with James LoMenzo on it since "Head Crusher". == References == Category:Megadeth songs Category:2022 songs
